Posts.Content: ReneefromIowa wrote: I'm glad I found this site. I have had callbacks from mammograms for 8 years. I am 58. This one, however has me scared. I have micro calcifications that have been watched. They have now grown and there is now a cluster which the radiologist says is concerning. I had a 3 D Mammon, then a 3D diagnostic mammogram. He kept saying if it is cancer, it is early. I am freaking out! No history of breast cancer in my family. Trying not to over-react but am not sleeping. It has been a week since the callback..... Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Having a Biopsy Wednesday ReneefromIowa Nurse1224
